title.native: メタルファイト ベイブレード

description:
A new cast of characters take on the continued battle between good and evil. Ginga, our hero, and his group of loyal friends take on a dangerous group called the Dark Nebula. The Dark Nebula’s sole mission is to take over the world and unleash their evil upon it; but before they can do so, they must destroy Ginga as he is the only person that’s strong enough to stand in their way. The plot thickens as friends become enemies and enemies become allies. Everything starts and ends with Ginga as he struggles to find the strength to defend his world and the honor of Beyblade.

(Source: Beyblade.com)

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

爆転シュート　ベイブレード

node.description: Known to be a fast and efficient worker. Often directing multiple works at a time.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/oitan125) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/花田十輝)

Jukki Hanada is a Japanese screenwriter and novelist. He is the grandson of literary critic and essayist Kiyoteru Hanada. He formerly belonged to [Takao Koyama's](https://anilist.co/staff/117575/Takao-Koyama) Brother Noppo anime scenario house. He's currently affiliated with SATZ.

He's a big fan of professional baseball and supports the Hiroshima Toyo Carp.

Originating from [Studio Ghibli](https://anilist.co/studio/21/).

_Note: Not to be confused with either the [Duel Masters character designer](https://anilist.co/staff/185645/) or the [studio coordinator](https://anilist.co/staff/172956/)._

Originating from [Studio Ghibli](https://anilist.co/studio/21/).

_Note: Not to be confused with either the [Duel Masters character designer](https://anilist.co/staff/185645/) or the [studio coordinator](https://anilist.co/staff/172956/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/2876412506)

Representative director of [Felix Film](https://anilist.co/studio/6126/). Adept in animation and composite work.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/moisesmora13/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/MoisesIvanMora) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MoisesIvanMora)

Moisés Iván Mora González is a Mexican actor and voice actor. He is best known for being the Latin American Spanish voice of Rigby in *Regular Show*, Blu in *Rio*, Scott Pilgrim in *Scott Pilgrim vs. the World* and Brad Buttowski in *Kick Buttowski: Suburban Daredevil*

He is the father of [Zoe Mora](https://anilist.co/staff/201443/Zoe-Mora).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/325492584) | [Sakugabooru](https://www.sakugabooru.com/post?tags=tatsuya_yoshihara)

Freelance animator formerly affiliated with [Actas](https://anilist.co/studio/60/) where he was attending its internal animation school and debuted as animator at the age of 20. His work has been greatly influenced by contemporary Kanada school animators [Seiya Numata](https://anilist.co/staff/124320/) and [Hironori Tanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/103979/). 

He's a precocious talent, debuting as episode director at the age of 21 and as director at the age of 23 with [Arve Rezzle](https://anilist.co/anime/13863/), as part of the Young Animator Training Project.

Married to fellow animator [Kikuko Sadakata](https://anilist.co/staff/105769).
